Company politics discussed for non-leadership roles
Inability to describe the corporate or team culture
You and your would-be manager don’t “click”
Zero training or conference budget

1104615781491503104.text: On, and listen to your gut. Your emotional well-being is important, and if you see red flags during the interview process, be sure to perform due diligence to understand as much as you can before leaping.

1104606725351620608.text:
Need to know which cert(s) to get? Take the sample tests and look at the content. If it intrigues you, consider the cert.

Following your interests as much as possible in your career will help reduce burnout. Prioritizing employment with companies with great cultures will, too.

1104606139986178048.text:
While on the job, get certified (preferably using your employer’s budget) on everything you touch. 

Repay your boss by going the extra mile to handle their needs and work well with your team.
